AT.name: Twisted Fusion
AT.description: Three friends are transported to a strange world unlike our own. Surrounded by strange creatures and even stranger locals, Cora and her friends have only their wits and a brace of water guns to rely upon! Luckily for our plucky trio of outlanders, the water found in this curious new land possesses mysterious qualities; transforming their ordinary water guns into powerful weapons. Set off on an epic adventure with up to 4 friends. Explore the breath-taking sky islands of Evan and aid their inhabitants by completing challenging quests and defeating the hordes of monsters that plague the land. Discover the secrets of Evan’s towers and defeat the dangerous creatures that guard them. Twisted Fusion offers an open world experience, allowing players to choose their own path as they seek to find a way back to our world. Use the Wii U™ GamePad to access a host of apps on Cora’s smartphone. Track the time and weather, check your quest progress, fast travel and unlock new characters, costumes, abilities and gadgets. Players can even collect and train their own team of monsters. Stranded in a strange land, our heroes seek only a way home. Can they overcome the dark forces that seek to hinder their mission?

Players can even collect and train their own team of monsters. Stranded in a strange land, our heroes seek only a way home. Can they overcome the dark forces that seek to hinder their mission?

BE.name: Twisted Fusion
BE.description: Trois amis se retrouvent transportés dans un drôle de monde qui ne ressemble pas au nôtre. Entourés de créatures étranges et de la population locale qui l’est encore plus, Cora et ses amis ne peuvent compter que sur leur courage et une poignée de pistolets à eau ! Mais heureusement pour notre trio de courageux étrangers, l’eau de cette étrange nouvelle contrée est dotée de mystérieuses propriétés ; elle transforme leurs pistolets à eau ordinaires en de puissantes armes. Lancez-vous dans une aventure épique que vous pourrez partager à cinq joueurs. Explorez les îles célestes à couper le souffle d’Evan, et aidez leurs habitants en complétant des quêtes difficiles et en venant à bout des hordes de monstres qui infestent les lieux. Twisted Fusion vous fera vivre une expérience en « open world », permettant aux joueurs de choisir leur propre voie pour trouver le chemin du retour à la maison. Utilisez le Wii U™ GamePad pour accéder à une multitude d’applications sur le smartphone de Cora. Suivez l’heure et la météo, vérifiez la progression de votre quête, utilisez les déplacements rapides et débloquez de nouveaux personnages, costumes, capacités et gadgets. Vous pourrez même recueillir et entraîner votre propre équipe de monstres. Bloqués dans un monde étrange, nos héros veulent seulement rentrer à la maison. Pourront-ils surmonter les forces obscures qui cherchent à entraver leur mission?

PT.description: Three friends are transported to a strange world unlike our own. Surrounded by strange creatures and even stranger locals, Cora and her friends have only their wits and a brace of water guns to rely upon! Luckily for our plucky trio of outlanders, the water found in this curious new land possesses mysterious qualities; transforming their ordinary water guns into powerful weapons. Set off on an epic adventure with up to 4 friends. Explore the breath-taking sky islands of Evan and aid their inhabitants by completing challenging quests and defeating the hordes of monsters that plague the land. Discover the secrets of Evan’s towers and defeat the dangerous creatures that guard them. Twisted Fusion offers an open world experience, allowing players to choose their own path as they seek to find a way back to our world. Use the Wii U™ GamePad to access a host of apps on Cora’s smartphone. Track the time and weather, check your quest progress, fast travel and unlock new characters, costumes, abilities and gadgets. Players can even collect and train their own team of monsters. Stranded in a strange land, our heroes seek only a way home. Can they overcome the dark forces that seek to hinder their mission?
